title: BRIEF-Tanger Q4 FFO Per Share $0.68
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Tanger Factory Outlet Centers Inc :
* TANGER REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END RESULTS FOR 2017
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.68 * ‍PROVIDED INITIAL EARNINGS GUIDANCE FOR 2018​ * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.66 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES ‍FOR 2018 FFO PER SHARE $2.43 - $2.49​
* SEES 2018 ‍PORTFOLIO NOI GROWTH FOR CONSOLIDATED PORTFOLIO BETWEEN 0.5% AND 1.5%​
* ‍SEES 2018 COMBINED RECURRING CAPITAL EXPENDITURES AND SECOND-GENERATION TENANT ALLOWANCES OF APPROXIMATELY $34 MILLION​
* SEES ‍FOR 2018, SAME CENTER NOI FOR CONSOLIDATED PORTFOLIO BETWEEN DOWN 1.0 PERCENT AND 0.0 PERCENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
